titleStmt.title: A sermon preached Feb. 19. 1692. upon the funeral of that late excelllent [sic] servant of our Lord Jesus, Mr. Richard Fincher who finished his course, Feb. 10. 1692. By Samuel Slater, M.A. minister of the gospel.
titleStmt.author: Slater, Samuel, d. 1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by J. Astwood for John Lawrence at the Angel in the Poultrey,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Dr. Williams' Library.
